short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Creampie Wallet Wallet in your Browser
short.zh_CN: 币安智能链浏览器插件
short.zh_TW: 币安智能链瀏覽器擴充插件

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Creampie Wallet is the perfect way to store, send or receive your favorite BSC tokens.
Creampie is an innovative chrome wallet that is secure and allows you to view all the latest tokens (Over 2000+) on the BSC chain. Track new gems from Pancake Swap easily!

Creampie Wallet is built exclusively for Google Chrome as an extension right in your browser. Convient and Easy to Use!

Your private keys never leave your device. Strong wallet encryption and cryptography guarantee that your funds will remain safe under your ultimate control.
